title: 🎉 Welcome!!! 🎉
text:
My name is Jianyuan(most people will know me as Andy) Hu. TDLR, I am a CPA and am now quite active as an analytics engineer. Once again thank you for paying me a visit. If you are interested in:

knowing more about me 😎, please continue to “More About Me”. Or,
my hobby data projects 📊, please head to “Project Gallery” on the left navigation panel.
my endeavors in education/helping others upskill in data analytics 📚, please head to “Education Gallery” on the left navigation panel.




I am glad that you are interested in me enough to read along here. I am a CPA, so by trade, that makes me an accountant. 👨🏻‍💼💼
That said, I’m a data nerd, too. Occasionally, I make a bunch of funny names like R, Python, SQL, Excel, Microsoft Fabric (including Power BI), Tableau etc. all dance together so that people can make the best out of their data. People also call me analytics engineer at times. I’m a big in the magic when you mix classic accounting with modern analytics – it’s like peanut butter and jelly, but for business.
Education is a BIG deal to me. I love helping others to grow, especially realizing their hidden potential. When I’m not nerding out things 🧑🏻‍💻, you can find me in the classroom, teaching courses at colleges/universities/group training. Subjects vary: accounting, statistics, data tool stacks, you name it. In addition, I mentor and coach apsiring professionals through various competitions and exam preparations, as well.
If you believe I can make your life better in anyways, or if you like exchange ideas, let’s connect! 🤝 You can find me through LinkedIn via the LinkedIn icon at the upper left corner of this page. 😎

 
  
   
  
    
     LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github

title: Education Gallary
text:
Hello! Here is a collection of my educational projects/cotent I developed over time as I taught at different institutions to various audiences. As I said in my welcome message: education 🧑🏻‍🏫 has a particular place in my heart…
Here, you will be able to find out what I have done… and with a lot more to come…

title: Education Gallary
text:
Hello! Here is a collection of my educational projects/cotent I developed over time as I taught at different institutions to various audiences. As I said in my welcome message: education 🧑🏻‍🏫 has a particular place in my heart…
Here, you will be able to find out what I have done… and with a lot more to come…

title: Education Gallary
text:
How Does This Work?
To start with, you will be able to find a list of all my projects.
There is also a search box that allows you to search by a project name (like Camelot Caves Inc.) or filter by a particular tag (like “Power BI”).
Click on any project name will redirect you to view a particular educational project.
After you are redirected to that project, and if you wish to come back to this page, you can easily do so by clicking the “Go Back” button on your browser.
If you find anything interesting feel free to use them and I hope it can be valuable to you.
If you like what you see and would like to collaborate on or deliver something, feel free to reach out through LinkedIn, right here on this page (upper left corner, LinkedIn logo).
Have fun and enjoy! 😃
